S06pplg202u:5_6: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃn rūpam eva śunyaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam eva śunyaṃ /
S06pplg202u:5_8: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śunyā ity ākhyātāḥ āha /
S06pplg202u:5_9: śunyā bhagavan sarvadharmā iti tathāgatenākhyātā yā ca bhagavaṃn śunyatā /
S06pplg202u:5_10: 6 sā / aprameyāpi sā aparimāṇāpi sā na hi bhagavaṃ śunyatāyāḥ saṃkhyopalabhyate na pramāṇaṃ na parimāṇam upalabhyate /
S06pplg202u:5_11: tasmāt tarhi bhagavaṃ naiṣān dharmāṇām arthato
S06pplg202u:5_13: bhagavān āha / evam etat subhūte evam etat* naiṣān dharmāṇām arthato vā vyaṃjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate /
S06pplg202u:5_15: 8 akṣayam iti vā aprameyam iti vā /
S06pplg202u:5_16: śunyam iti vā ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā anabhisaṃskāram iti vā anutpāda iti vā virāga iti vā nirodha iti vā nirvāṇam
S06pplg202u:5_17: 9 iti vā / deśanābhinirhāranirdeśa eṣa tathāgatasyākṣayam iti vā yāvan nirvāṇam iti vā /
S06pplg202u:5_18: āha / āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac cedaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathāgatena deśitā anabhilāpyā /
S06pplg202u:5_19: 10 bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi / sarvadharmā eva bhagavann anabhilāpyāḥ /
S06pplg202u:5_20: bhagavān āha / evam etat subhūte evam etat* sarvadharmā subhūte anabhilāpyāḥ yā subhūte dharmāṇām anabhilāpyatā sā
S06pplg202u:5_21: 11 śunyatā na ca śunyatāyāṃ kiṃ cid abhilapitaṃ nāpi śunyatā śakyā abhilapituṃ āha /
S06pplg202u:5_22: kaccit punar bhagavaṃn anabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā /
S06pplg202u:5_24: āha / sacet punar bhagavaṃn anabhilāpyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇis tad dānapāramitayā api bhagavaṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati /
S06pplg202u:5_25: 13 śīlapāramitayāḥ kṣāntipāramitayāḥ vīryapāramitayāḥ dhyānapāramitayāḥ prajñāpāramitayāḥ api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati /
S06pplg202u:6_0_0: [GBM 577.1 = LPG(Ch) 205r] mārgasya aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvasamāpattīnāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
S06pplg202u:6_0_1: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06pplg202u:6_3: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām abhāvo bhaviṣyati /
S06pplg202u:6_4: eṣāṃ ca dharmāṇām abhāvāt sarvākārajñatāyā apy abhāvo
S06pplg202u:6_5: 3 bhaviṣyati / sarvākārajñatāyā abhāvāt ko hy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate /
S06pplg202u:6_6: abhisaṃbhotsyate vā / bhagavān āha / evam etat subhūte evam etat* nānabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā /
S06pplg202u:6_7_0: 4 cet punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam
S06pplg202u:6_9: atha ca punar asyaivaṃ bhavati nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā /
S06pplg202u:6_10: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs
S06pplg202u:6_11: 6 tāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayati tathā ca pariṇamayati /
S06pplg202u:6_12: yathā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg202u:6_13: 7 dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayati /
S06pplg202u:6_14: 8 samyaksaṃbodhiḥ āha kathaṃ bhagavaṃn anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06pplg202u:6_15: bhagavān āha / yā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06pplg202u:6_17_0: 9 samyaksaṃbodhiḥ / bhagavān āha / yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sā naiva
S06pplg202u:6_17_1: vardhate na parihīyate tat subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
S06pplg202u:6_18: 10 prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhīkṣṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati na kasya cid dharmasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg202u:6_19: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilāpyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na
S06pplg202u:6_20: 11 parihāṇi / evaṃ khalu subhūte dānapāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā prajñāpāramitāyā naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ /
S06pplg202u:6_21: 12 yāvat pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ /
S06pplg202u:6_22: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ /
